name: Justin Justice
text: The worst of the chains. The ingredients are too cheap to make a good tasting pizza. Even Papa John himself has admitted that they use canned sauce. Ew and yuck! The wings suck, too. They are frozen and reheated. Is there such a thing as ‚Ä¶More

text: This place used to be good; now quality of their employees and food are degraded day by day. I think employees just following 'Mr. Save' manager's order.. or just can't compete with other places in proximity that offers better service and ‚Ä¶More

name: Ethan Thomas
text: I had Place and order last night, and the service was Awesome. My food was delivered nice and hot and on time. My Children loves papa johns they get me to order from this Location almost every week. Thank you so much for great service and the delicious food.

name: Hot User
text: The pizza came really cold. I tried calling them, no one would answer the phone. Horrible service, the food is not worth the money.

name: Rachael Collins
text: I placed an order and it took over an hour for it to get to me. When it finally showed up the food wasn't even hot. It was barely even warm. I could probably understand the delivery taking an hour and a half if it were in the evening time ‚Ä¶More

name: Lisandra Rivera-Mendez
text: My experience with papa John's was very great.The person who took my order explained the specials in addition to repeating back my order which some places forget quit often to do. When my order arrived it was fresh and hot. I will definitely will be placing future orders.

name: jeff davis
text: Just horrible. Not only did they forget our order but also gave us the wrong toppings and pizza crust! Very rude over the phone! It was their fault for forgetting our order and they had the audacity to be mad?!?! I do not like the hassle of ‚Ä¶More

name: Kyngelle Mertilien
text: I just stopped by papa John's in feasterville  for a grab and my experience was absolutely amazing! The staff was professional and my meal was delicious. The wait time was exactly what I was quoted (I was tight on time). Thank you for everything!

name: William Hansen
text: Although there was a slight mix up with my order, a man names Ludovic assisted me and made things right. He was very professional and practiced excellent customer retention skills. I am in the customer service business and was blown away ‚Ä¶More

name: Kyahra Pineda
text: Just wow!! The food is really good, this is my go to pizza place. I always have a good experience, they provide good service, and if you aren't satisfied they can fix it for you with almost to no charge.

name: Francis E. Gonzalez
text: Place gives good service and quality pizza.

text: Horrible customer service. Ordered one pizza and a breadsticks. Approaching the second hour. Called and got a attitude. AVOID.

text: Delicious pizza made with fresh ingredients.  Polite and courteous staff.

text: Truly the worst garbage out there. Any mom and pop shop eats Papa John's for breakfast, especially these rude jerks. Wow, they treat all customers as the enemy.

text: Nope.  Wouldn't let me give this 0 stars... good job PJ's you've earned a star.  I heard too much bad from a former employee and even before that I had suspicions.  No no... do not go.
